question: Aluminum is getting popular worldwide today as a “Green Metal”. Which among the following properties of Aluminum makes it a Green Metal?
option1: Aluminum has been providing a replacement of wood for saving forests and contributes in environment protection
option2: Aluminum is a light metal and it is resistant to corrosion
option3: Aluminum has fairly high rate of recycling and it can be re-used repeatedly without its quality deteriorating
option4: The lands after the Bauxite mining can be restored very quickly and easily
answer: Aluminum has fairly high rate of recycling and it can be re-used repeatedly without its quality deteriorating
